archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Real Estate HSE Regulation and Auditing Support
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: Real Estate HSE Regulation and Auditing Support supports the investment and operational organizations to be aware of the applicable laws and industry standards. In addition it supports the possibility for HSE auditing. HSE (Healty, Safety & Environmental) aspects of real estates, and equipment and services related to the real estates needs to be evaluated continuously to comply to applicable laws and relevant industry standards.

properties.value: Environmental Health & Safety Monitoring and Compliance Management
